title: serinzo
author: serinzo
content: Hello I am ABDULRAHMANi just wanted to make sure before I buy Bitmain Antminer S9 13.5 TH/sCan I run it to mine on Kaspa ?

comments.author: hustleman
comments.body: No you can not use a S9 to mine Kaspa.Â  S9 mines SHA-256 algo.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: serinzo on August 22, 2023, 10:27:49 PMHello I am ABDULRAHMANi just wanted to make sure before I buy Bitmain Antminer S9 13.5 TH/sCan I run it to mine on Kaspa ?Who wanted to sell you such an ASIC and for what price?This is a very old asic, which gives little profit even on free electricity and its price is no more than $ 40 for 1 asic with a power supply. With a wholesale purchase of 5 pieces, the price can be in the range of 25-35 dollars.Learn modern asics on this site https://www.asicminervalue.com/and stay away from old hardware unless you're a pro.
